description:
Have that one number you are always dialing.  Just want o push a icon with their picture on it and launch the phone with their number entered. This is the application for you. You can select a contact and their number. The application Icon appears as their contact picture. When you launch the application it will open the phone with that person's number entered for you.

The icon can be added to you launch icons or dragged onto the wave for quick dialing access

Soon companion apps will be appearing to give you more quick launch icons on you application launch screen. (A paid version without adds will also be out soon).
